meanings.definition: relating to the measurement of time or the art of making clocks and watches.
meanings.sent1: The horological expert meticulously crafted the intricate clock mechanism.
meanings.sent2: The horological museum displayed a fascinating collection of antique timepieces.
meanings.sent3: The horological enthusiast joked that he could 'watch' the clock all day.
meanings.sent4: Her precision in arranging the meeting schedule was like a horological masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The horological craftsmanship of the watchmaker was truly impressive.
